name: EMPIRE-11
description: AI-Powered Business Operations Suite - 12 specialized business agents for systematic solopreneur operations

agents.name: chief
agents.description: Business mission commander - Pure coordination and strategic oversight

agents.name: strategy
agents.description: Strategic advisor (SAGE) - Long-term planning and market positioning

agents.name: execution
agents.description: Daily execution partner (ALEX) - Task management and productivity optimization

agents.name: analytics
agents.description: Business intelligence (KAI) - Data analysis and performance tracking

agents.name: marketing
agents.description: Marketing strategist (ASTRA) - Brand development and customer acquisition

agents.name: sales
agents.description: Revenue operations (NOVA) - Sales optimization and pipeline management

agents.name: customer
agents.description: Customer success (LUNA) - Retention and satisfaction optimization

agents.name: operations
agents.description: Operations manager (PHOENIX) - Process optimization and efficiency

agents.name: content
agents.description: Content director (BOB) - Content strategy and thought leadership

agents.name: pr
agents.description: Public relations (ECHO) - Reputation management and communications

agents.name: finance
agents.description: Financial operations (ZARA) - Budget planning and financial analysis

agents.name: legal
agents.description: Legal & risk (REX) - Compliance and risk management
